channel.title: Jericho's Tavern
channel.description: A long form blog that touches on tech rants, passionate retrospectives, adventures on the internet and other life updates.

item.title: 5. Addendum
item.description: This is a page I forgot to write about syntax and RSS descriptions!

item.title: 4. Hosting
item.description: This is a Markdown RSS description for the hosting page.

item.title: 3. Theming
item.description: Zoner uses the same CSS class names and ids as Zonelets, so any Zonelets theme automatically works!

item.title: 2. Header Setup
item.description: Your header.md will traditionally serve as the navigation bar for the site. It should contain links to all the pages you'd like people to visit.

item.title: 1. Zone Structure
item.description: A Zone is just a folder containing all the data for Zoner to build your website.
